body:
I am trying to build [oct-files](https://octave.org/doc/v4.2.1/Getting-Started-with-Oct_002dFiles.html#Getting-Started-with-Oct_002dFiles) using octave's mkoctfile executable. 

I am aware of octave and compiler [issue](https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/4874), but I am not sure if it has been worked around using `env` or not. Could someone @alalazo update me if mkoctfile is somehow available or not? I am limited in programming and I read Gibberish.

Thanks!
title: octave mkoctfile status
